name: Snakescape (itch) (krasse, hadiDanial)
description:
Press 'R' to restart level :)

You are a snake, trying to escape a temple. Obstacles keep popping up around you, and you're running out of space! Hurry up and escape before you get trapped! 

You can eat food to grow or shrink.

This game was in 3 days made for the Ludum Dare 42 game Jam. Credits:

Krasse: Music, SFXs, Programming

Real Truth: Game & Level Design

CloudCraft: Systems & Level Designer

Hadi: Programming,  Art
